job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to enhancing the performance of an AI system, which falls under the broader category of model improvement and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: The act of reviewing AI solutions and participating in fine-tuning sessions is a direct involvement in the process of improving and adapting AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies are core activities in the development and evaluation of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This involves combining different capabilities (human expertise and AI) into a functional system for customer support, which is a software development task.
While also related to modeling, the act of 'improving' an existing system in a production context can also imply operational adjustments and maintenance.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

classification.rationale: The role focuses on improving AI systems, fine-tuning models, and integrating AI capabilities for customer support. While it involves some operational aspects, the emphasis is on direct interaction with and enhancement of generative AI models and their application.
